name: MyRaspberryPinout
0:
”Alexa, open my raspberry pinout”
”Alexa, ask my raspberry pinout what is pin number 1”
”Alexa, tell my raspberry pinout to search for ground pins”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my raspberry pinout
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill gives you basic and detailed information about any Raspberry PI B+, 2, 3 and Zero pins. It is useful mainly when your hands are full, trying to wire components to the board or when you want to make sure you wire the right pin.

The skill will give you the BCM and Wiring PI number of each pin and you can also ask for more details. When you ask for a pin, you can select next, previous or get more details.

The skill can also return which pins belongs to a function, e.g., ask: what are the ground pins.

Note! The current information is basic. More data will be added.

For comments, suggestions and features request, please send an email to: zkillworld@gmail.com
